Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Korean \Korean\ prop. a. Of or pertaining to Korea; as, Korean handicrafts; the Korean war. [WordNet 1.5]

Korean adj : of or relating to or characteristic of Korea or its people or language; "Korean handicrafts" n 1: a native or inhabitant of Korea who speaks the Korean language 2: the Altaic language spoken by the Korean people
